mapper.insert: insert into org_rel (ORG_REL_ID, A_ORG_ID, Z_ORG_ID, ORG_REL_TYPE, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, REMARK) values (#{orgRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{aOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{zOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgRelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update org_rel set A_ORG_ID = #{aOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Z_ORG_ID = #{zOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ORG_REL_TYPE = #{orgRelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EFF_DATE = #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXP_DATE = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORG_REL_ID = #{orgRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ORG_REL_ID, A_ORG_ID, Z_ORG_ID, ORG_REL_TYPE, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, REMARK from org_rel where ORG_REL_ID = #{orgRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select ORG_REL_ID, A_ORG_ID, Z_ORG_ID, ORG_REL_TYPE, EFF_DATE, EXP_DATE, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, REMARK from org_rel
